nodes.text: Escape was a Ta-Ree spell capable of being wielded by Ascendants on the planet Kathol. The spell allowed the caster to escape bonds by contorting their body and dislocating their joints in painful ways. The difficulty of the task was dependent on the device used to restrain the Ascendants. The caster also needed to known the block pain and boost attribute spells in order to suppress the pain and focus on the task.
